data.title: Coins
data.meta_description: Heberden Coin Room, Ashmolean Museum, University of Oxford
data.text:
Dating

77 AH (=AD 696-697)

Obverse

بسم الله لا اله الا الله و حده محمد رسول الله, Standing caliph figure with girdle band shown in a very thin loop, Arabic inscription around clockwise from 1h,all enclosed by traces of beaded circle

Reverse

بسم الله ضرب هذا الدينار سنة سبع و سبعين, transformed cross on four steps surmounted by a small globe, Arabic inscription around clockwise from 1h,all enclosed by traces of beaded circle

Dating

94 AH (= AD 712–713)

Obverse

ININdNNISSISƮ . . . Sd, Eight-pointed star in field, blundered Latin inscription in margin and partly off flan, surrounded by beaded circle, also partially off flan

Reverse

HSSdFRNNSPNANNXCINI / INdCXI, Blundered Latin inscription in margin, partially off flan, continuing into field. surrounded by beaded circle, also partially off flan

Dating

circa 85–92 AH (= AD 704–711)

Obverse

Unreadable, Heavily blundered Latin inscription in margin, partially off flan, continuing across central field

Reverse

Unreadable, Transformed cross on two steps with horizontal bar on top in field, surrounded by a blundered Latin inscription in margin, most of which is off flan

Dating

78 AH (= AD 697–698)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription in margin from 3h anti-clockwise (Sura 9:33, in part) , all surrounded by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription in margin from 12h anti-clockwise, all surrounded by beaded circle

Dating

79 AH (= AD 698–699)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9: v. 33 (in part)), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112: vv. 1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

80 AH (= AD 699–700)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شرله, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

80 AH (= AD 699–700)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9: v. 33 (in part)), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112: vv. 1-3), point below first line of field inscription, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

81 AH (= AD 700–701)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field (shahāda), point between the second and third lines of field inscription, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9: v. 33 (in part)), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112: vv. 1-3), point below first line of field inscription, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

82 AH (= AD 701–702)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), two vertical points at bottom of field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

83 AH (= AD 702–703)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field (shahāda), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), two vertical points at bottom of field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

86 AH (= AD 705–706)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 230h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1h, point above ḍād of ḍuriba in marginal inscription, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

87 AH (= AD 706–707)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1h, point above ḍād of ḍuriba and below bā’ of sab‘a in marginal inscription, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

87 AH (= AD 706–707)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

88 AH (= AD 707–708)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), two vertical pellets below field inscription, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

89 AH (= AD 708)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), two vertical pellets below field inscription, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1h, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

90 AH (= AD 708-709)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1h, point below bā’ of duriba in marginal marginal inscription, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

91 AH (= AD 709–710)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, point below bā’ of duriba in marginal inscription, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

92 AH (= AD 710–711)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1230h, point beneath bā' of duriba in marginal inscription, all enclosed by beaded circle

Dating

94 AH (= AD 712–713)

Obverse

لا اله الا / الله و حده / لا شريك له, Arabic inscription in field, Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 3h (Sura 9:33, in part), all enclosed by beaded circle

Reverse

الله احد الله / الصمد لم يلد / و لم يولد, Arabic inscription in field (Sura 112:1-3), Arabic inscription anti-clockwise in margin from 1h, all enclosed by beaded circle
